# GitHub Action: kustomize-build-check

This is a Go-based GitHub Action that automatically discovers and validates Kustomize overlays and bases.

## Project Type
- Language: Go
- Type: GitHub Action
- Purpose: Validate Kustomize builds with automatic overlay/base discovery

## Development Guidelines
- Use Go idioms and best practices
- Keep dependencies minimal
- Ensure clear error messages
- Follow GitHub Actions best practices
- Support both Docker-based and composite actions patterns
